    Standard names

    Paul-Antoine Chevalier

    2018-04-09

    This vignette compare tricky’s set_standard_names() function to tibble’s set_tidy_names().

    library("tibble")
library("tricky")
table_sample <- tibble(
  `base élèves` = c("toto"), 
  `2017/07/07` = as.Date("2017-07-01")
  )
    table_sample %>% 
  set_standard_names()
    ## # A tibble: 1 x 2
##   base_eleves var_2017_07_07
##   <chr>       <date>        
## 1 toto        2017-07-01
    table_sample %>% 
  set_tidy_names(syntactic = TRUE)
    ## New names:
## base élèves -> base.élèves
## 2017/07/07 -> X2017.07.07
    ## # A tibble: 1 x 2
##   base.élèves X2017.07.07
##   <chr>       <date>     
## 1 toto        2017-07-01

    Developed by Paul-Antoine Chevalier.
